task.prompt: The area of the parallelogram generated by the vectors $\mathbf{a}$ and $\mathbf{b}$ is 8.  Find the area of the parallelogram generated by the vectors $2 \mathbf{a} + 3 \mathbf{b}$ and $\mathbf{a} - 5 \mathbf{b}.$
